title: Animals on the Loose: A You vs. Wild Movie
writer: Robert Buchta, Bear Grylls, Delbert Shoopman
genre: Family Features, US Movies, Reality TV
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: When wild animals escape from a sanctuary, Bear Grylls — and you — must pursue them and secure their protective habitat. An interactive special.
